tika.dc.description:
Product Description

When Billy Drake a career criminal is released from prison his arrival threatens to destroy those he left behind seventeen years previously, unchanged he remains the man he once was, liked by some but despised by most and capable of almost anything. Picking up where he left off he tries to forge a new life for himself whilst including those from his old existence.
Long forgotten acts that he had hoped would never surface are thrust to the forefront of his mind, the knowledge and proof of his heinous acts as a much younger man has fallen into the wrong hands.
With his eldest daughter soon to marry he learns how much of an impact he has had in shaping her fiancées life despite only one very brief passing in their joint pasts.
Secrets emerge that would have been better to stay buried, connections are made and questions answered for all involved, while for some whose painful memories were never overcome are dealt another crushing blow.
Deliberation and the threat of violence and bloodshed join forces for long awaited revenge that accumulate in unthinkable decisions having to be made.
In Matt McQuaids life he has lost people he cared about, their deaths changing fate with them, twice the path of his destiny has changed just as it looked impossible to do so, before he commits to a lifetime of marriage and for the sake of any children he may be blessed to share with his beloved Suzy he needs to clean the bloodline.
